author: Unknown
story: Once upon a time, in a quiet village, there lived a curious cat named Milo.@Milo loved exploring, and one day he found a hidden path behind the old windmill.@The path led to a glowing tree that whispered secrets of the forest.@Milo listened carefully and learned how to help the village crops grow better.@He returned home a hero, and every evening, he sat by the windmill, guarding the secret path.
